org.parosproxy.paros.control

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.parosproxy.paros.control.AbstractControl
      • org.parosproxy.paros.control.Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SessionListener

    public class Control
extends AbstractControl
implements SessionListener
    Overall control with interaction on model and view.
